select
from t_wh_odo_line where id = #{id} and ou_id =#{ouId}

mapper.select: select count(*) from t_wh_odo_line where odo_id=#{odoId} and ou_id=#{ouId}

select count(*)
from t_wh_odo_line where odo_id = #{odoId} and ou_id =#{ouId}

from t_wh_odo_line line left join t_wh_odo odo on line.odo_id = odo.id
